column1: Baby Barnaby's////Little Barney's was a tight little cozy breakfast spot. Coffee was fresh
column3: and the waffle was crisp and delicious. Seating on the patio was a little close to others
column4: but once the food came out
column5: that kept everyone from talking as much. We were checked on frequently. Better beat the crowd
column6: because they will come and the tables will fill up quick!!
